name: WagonCapacityColor
title: Wagon Capacity Color
title_original: Wagon Capacity Color (colorize wagons whether they are empty, filled or full.)
author: BinbinHfr
description: Change the color of the wagon, whether it's empty (green) or partially filled (red).
description_original: Changes the color of any wagon, whether it's empty (green) or partially filled (yellow) or full (red).
